short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redbird extension for robotic process automation and data collection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed for users of the Redbird platform. The Redbird extension lets users record their user flow on any website. These recordings can collect data and take other actions that then feed into automated workflows on the Redbird platform.

The extension is simple to use.  Just download, log in using your Redbird credentials, click “Start Recording”, then navigate to a website and complete your user flow.  When done, click “Stop Recording”. Once a recording is finalized, go to the Redbird platform to access your recording and connect it to a workflow.
